title: FL Studio API Stubs Model Config
description: Configuration file schema for the FL Studio API Stubs project. You should place this schema in an `fl_config.json` file in your project.
$comment: If updating this schema, also update the default configuration and config_typings.py

disallowDeprecatedFunctions.description: Should calling a deprecated function raise an error? (boolean)

disallowFutureFunctions.description: Should calling a function added in an API version greater than the target version raise an error? (boolean)

disallowKeyEchoes.description: Should calling a function that echoes a keyboard shortcut raise an error? (boolean)

targetApiVersion.description: The version of the FL Studio Python API that you are targeting, either as an FL Studio version or an API version. (number or string)
